languages.text: {n}Послушник отпирает замок и передает вам сферу. Кто-то до вас двигал обручи и постарался составить из букв осмысленные фразы. Остается лишь пара движений, прежде чем сфера будет четко поделена на четыре части, каждая со своим вопросом. Ответы, видимо, следует собирать из смежных обручей.{/n}

{n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Послушник отпирает замок и передает вам сферу. Кто-то до вас двигал обручи и постарался составить из букв осмысленные фразы. Остается лишь пара движений, прежде чем сфера будет четко поделена на четыре части, каждая со своим вопросом. Ответы, видимо, следует собирать из смежных обручей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The acolyte opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will take only a few movements before the orb splits clearly in four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be assembled from adjacent hoops.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'initié ouvre la serrure et vous tend l'orbe. Quelqu'un a déjà manipulé ses anneaux pour essayer de former des phrases cohérentes avec les lettres. Il suffit de quelques rotations de plus pour que l'orbe se sépare en quatre parties posant chacune une question différente. Il faut certainement donner les réponses à l'aide des anneaux qui leur sont connectés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}

Il suffit de quelques rotations de plus pour que l'orbe se sépare en quatre parties posant chacune une question différente. Il faut certainement donner les réponses à l'aide des anneaux qui leur sont connectés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El iniciado abre el cierre y deposita el orbe en tus manos. Alguien ha manipulado los aros en un intento de ordenar las letras para formar frases coherentes. Solo tienes que rotarlos un par de veces más para dividir el orbe en cuatro cuadrantes, cada uno de los cuales formula una pregunta. Cabe suponer que has de colocar los aros en las posiciones pertinentes para responderlas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}

languages.text: {n}助祭将锁打开，将神圣球体交到了你的手中。有人已经转过了这些圆环，试图将上面的文字排列成有意义的句子。只要再旋转几下，这个球体就会清晰地划分成四个区域，每个区域都有各自的问题，而问题的答案由相邻的圆环组成。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}助祭将锁打开，将神圣球体交到了你的手中。有人已经转过了这些圆环，试图将上面的文字排列成有意义的句子。只要再旋转几下，这个球体就会清晰地划分成四个区域，每个区域都有各自的问题，而问题的答案由相邻的圆环组成。{/n}

languages.text: {n}イニシエイトは鍵を開け、オーブを手渡した。すでに誰かがフープを動かして、文字を意味のある文章に並べようとしている。あと数回転させれば、オーブは4つの部分にきれいに分割され、それぞれに質問が表示されるだろう。答えはおそらく、隣り合うフープを使って作られるはずだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イニシエイトは鍵を開け、オーブを手渡した。すでに誰かがフープを動かして、文字を意味のある文章に並べようとしている。あと数回転させれば、オーブは4つの部分にきれいに分割され、それぞれに質問が表示されるだろう。答えはおそらく、隣り合うフープを使って作られるはずだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Eingeweihte öffnet das Schloss und überreicht dir die Kugel. Jemand hat die Ringe bereits bewegt und versucht, die Buchstaben zu sinnvollen Sätzen zusammenzufügen. Es sind nur einige weitere Rotationen nötig, bevor die Kugel sich in vier saubere Teile teilt, ein jeder mit einer eigenen Frage. Die Antworten muss man offenbar aus benachbarten Ringen bilden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zangoç kilidi açıyor ve sana küreyi veriyor. Birisi çevresindeki halkaları zaten hareket ettirmiş ve harfleri düzenleyerek anlamlı bir cümle meydana getirmeye çalışmış. Kürenin temiz bir şekilde dört parçaya ayrılması için birkaç çevrim daha yetecek ve bu dört parçanın her birinin üzerinde ayrı ayrı sorular var. Yanıtların bitişik halkalar kullanılarak oluşturulması gerektiği varsayılabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The initiate opens the lock and hands you the orb. Someone has already moved the hoops around, trying to arrange the letters into meaningful sentences. It will only take a few more rotations for the orb to split cleanly into four parts, each with its own question. The answers should presumably be formed using adjoining hoops.{/n}
